title: Ep 171 Psych Files Brief #5: Yawning, Telling Jokes to Babies, Politics and Looks
description: A whole bunch of fascinating studies in this episode of The Psych Files!  I cover the "Red Dress Effect", what exactly we're looking for in the facial characteristics of our leaders, how dark rooms might make you more likely to cheat, and how "contagious yawning" really works.  Join me on this jaunt down some of the recent and fun research coming out of the fascinating field of psychology.
